item.title: Samantha Bee Says Stephen Colbert’s ‘Late Show’ Was ‘Hemorrhaging Money’ and ‘People Aren’t Tuning In’: It’s a ‘No-Brainer’ to Cancel Amid Paramount-Skydance Merger
item.description: Former late-night host Samantha Bee is giving her take on CBS cancelling “The Late Show With Stephen Colbert.” During a recent appearance on the “Breaking Bread with Tom Papa”
